mean_cn: v. 停留，待在，暂住，坚持，止住，抑制，延缓，停（下）；  n. 逗留，延缓，中止，支柱
mean_en: to continue to be in the same place or with the same person or group for a period of time
deformation_desc: tay是一直小狗哦，你看出来了么？主人让你stay哦~
sentence: "Bye mommy! We are staying at home today!" said daddy.
sentence_trans: “妈妈再见！我们今天留在家里！”爸爸说。
